comment.text: This translation key "CustomRoomTitle" is used to display the label for custom rooms in various UI elements. It is likely used as a button title or a room type filter option, and its content should reflect the desired human-readable name for these custom rooms.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Sala particularizată' is a literal translation, it's not the most natural or commonly used phrasing for "Custom room" in Romanian. It sounds a bit formal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Cameră personalizată', 'Cameră proprie', or 'Cameră individuală' depending on the context. 'Cameră personalizată' is likely the best overall choice.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation 'අභිරුචි කාමරය' (abiruchi kamaraya) translates more closely to 'whimsical room' or 'arbitrary room' rather than 'custom room'. While 'අභිරුචි' (abiruchi) can relate to taste/preference, it doesn't directly convey the sense of customization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a translation like 'පිටcustomize කළ කාමරය' (pītakam customize kala kamaraya) which literally means 'customized room', or 'අපේ කැමැත්තට අනුව කාමරය' (ape kametta anuva kamaraya) which means 'room according to our wish'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation "Прилагођена соба" is a literal translation of 'Custom room' but may not be the most natural or idiomatic way to express the concept. 'Custom' often implies a user-created or personalized experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Корисничка соба" (User room), "Соба по мери" (Room tailored to your needs), or "Моја соба" (My room), depending on the exact context.
